# Layer 3 Manifest - FULL BACKUP content (private, everything)
# ================================================================
# Layer 3 = Layer 1 (all public content)
#         + Layer 2 (all premium content)
#         + BACKUP-ONLY folders listed below
#
# This is a COMPLETE backup of the entire working state.
# The ONLY things excluded are secrets (.env, credentials)
# and dev artifacts (node_modules, __pycache__, etc.)
#
# RULE: Layer 3 excludes ONLY secrets and dev artifacts.
# ================================================================

# === LAYER 2 CONTENT (premium) ===

# Knowledge base (pre-digested expert content)
knowledge/dossiers/
knowledge/playbooks/
knowledge/dna/
knowledge/sources/

# Expert agents (cloned minds)
agents/minds/

# Cargo agents (C-level, sales, marketing roles)
agents/cargo/

# Processed content
artifacts/

# === LAYER 3 ADDITIONS (backup-only) ===

# Company agents (org structure, roles, JDs)
agents/sua-empresa/

# Shared agent memory
agents/shared-memory/

# Agent archive and discovery
agents/archive/
agents/discovery/

# Boardroom outputs
agents/boardroom/outputs/

# Raw user uploads
inbox/

# Session and batch logs
logs/

# Knowledge extras
knowledge/_legacy/
knowledge/company/
knowledge/TAG-RESOLVER.json

# JARVIS state and memory
.claude/jarvis/
.claude/sessions/
.claude/mission-control/
.claude/agent-memory/
.claude/aios/
.claude/monitoring/
.claude/learning-system/
.claude/agents/
.claude/guides/
.claude/handoffs/
.claude/plans/
.claude/temp/

# System state
system/backups/
system/registry/
system/memory/
system/traces/
system/archive/
system/checkpoints/
system/moc/
system/temp/
system/jarvis-voice/
system/user-preferences.json
system/SESSION-STATE.md
system/JARVIS-STATE.json
system/database/

# === ALWAYS EXCLUDED (secrets + dev artifacts) ===
# These are NEVER included regardless of layer:
#   - .env, .env.*, *.key, *.pem, credentials.json, token.json
#   - .mcp.json, settings.local.json
#   - node_modules/, __pycache__/, .venv/, dist/, build/
#   - chroma_db/, .chroma/, *.db, *.sqlite
#   - .DS_Store, Thumbs.db, .vscode/, .idea/
#   - *.mp4, *.mp3, *.wav, *.m4a (large media)
#   - .aios-core/ (external framework)
